text: How can we address customers seeking a user-friendly interface?
In what ways can our products better represent customer personas?
How can our customers benefit from exceptional customer service to purchase our products?
What are some authentic ways to connect with our customers through branding & marketing?
How can we make excellent products that are affordable?
How can we make quality products that are durable?
How can we improve our products and features while still being effective?
How can we introduce new design with upgraded technology without losing the essence of who we are?
In what ways can we keep our customers happily while using our products?
How can we create targeted campaigns that maintain customer loyalty and encourage recommendations?
What kind of price range do we need to create to cater to diverse user profiles, without letting innovation negatively impact sales?
How can we incorporate customer usage and system reports to make longer lasting products that are still effective and elegant?
